hero.subtitle: Welcome to I Knowledge Factory. Explore our legacy, understand our DNA, and become part of our 25-year journey of digital excellence.

intro.title: Welcome to I Knowledge Factory.
intro.subtitle: Where strategy meets digital craftsmanship. We've been shaping the internet since 2000.

mission.title: The Mission
mission.content: IKF is a multidisciplinary agency that blends strategy, design, and performance marketing to help brands thrive across digital ecosystems. We survive market shifts by staying true to our core: Human Intelligence.

intro.footer: Explore the sidebar to begin your induction journey.

management.title: The Visionaries
management.subtitle: Guiding the IKF mainframes with over 75 years of combined digital intelligence.

leaders.name: Ashish Dalia
leaders.note: Welcome to IKF! With over 25 years of digital excellence, we've grown alongside the internet itself. Our journey from a boutique setup to a multidisciplinary agency has been driven by one core philosophy: Innovation, Knowledge, and Factory. We help global brands thrive across digital ecosystems using AI-refined strategies without losing the human lens. Your role here is crucial in maintaining our legacy of delivering high-impact solutions for our 1500+ clients.

leaders.name: Gunjan Bhansali
leaders.note: Gunjan oversees strategic operations and technological integration, ensuring that the Factory operates at peak industrial precision. Her focus on process optimization drives our ability to deliver consistent quality at scale.

leaders.name: Ritu Dalia
leaders.note: Ritu leads the creative and brand strategy units, focusing on human-centric digital storytelling. Her vision bridges the gap between data-driven performance and emotional brand connection.

pillars.title: Innovation
pillars.description: Obsessive curiosity. We don't just use technology; we blend AI-refined strategies with a human lens to solve business challenges.

pillars.title: Knowledge
pillars.description: Synthesized wisdom. Over 25 years of mastery in digital ecosystems fuels our strategic consultations and execution.

pillars.title: Factory
pillars.description: Precision at scale. Our industrialized processes ensure high-impact delivery for 1500+ global clients.

vision.title: The Vision
vision.content: To be a globally respected, multidisciplinary digital agency known for its commitment to excellence and innovation.

missionStatement.title: The Mission
missionStatement.content: To unlock the full growth potential of brands by pioneering new approaches and delivering high-impact digital solutions.

culture.title: The IKF Culture Code
culture.subtitle: Running on version 4.0. Optimized for high performance, creativity, and human-centric processing.

mainMessage.title: We Debug Problems, Not People.
mainMessage.description: In a high-pressure agency environment, we prioritize psychological safety. Mistakes are compile errors, not fatal crashes. We fix them together.

featuredPost.title: The Future of AI in Marketing
featuredPost.description: Our Director, Ashish Dalia, breaks down how generative AI is reshaping the agency landscape. Watch the full keynote now.

referral.title: Referral Program
referral.subtitle: Expand our collective intelligence. Connect high-caliber talent with IKF's industrial excellence.

policies.title: Eligibility
policies.description: All active agents of the IKF ecosystem are eligible to participate, excluding the Strategic Leadership and HR units.

policies.title: Payout Terms
policies.description: Rewards are processed upon the successful 90-day completion (Probation Handshake) of the referred candidate.

policies.title: Submission
policies.description: CVs must be submitted via the official portal link below to ensure tracking within the Talent Acquisition system.

policies.title: Duplicate Policy
policies.description: In case of duplicate referrals, the first timestamped submission will be recognized as the official source.

process.description: Locate high-impact talent matching our cultural and technical DNA.
Transmit coordinates (CV) to global HR via the secure submission node.
Candidate undergoes industrial verification and cultural integration.

policy.title: Execution Protocol
policy.description: IKF publishes its final holiday list at the start of every calendar year. Regional variations between Pune, Mumbai, and Noida offices are detailed in the official HR circular.
policy.compensatory: Holidays falling on Sundays are not carried forward as per agency standards.

punctuality.title: The Punctuality DNA
punctuality.description: Precision is our product. At IKF, synchronization starts with timing. Ensuring you're logged in by 09:30 AM helps the entire Factory begin its creative and technical operations without friction.
